boardgame.name: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Dice Masters: Battle for Faerûn
boardgame.description: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons Dice Masters: Battle for Faer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ucirc;n is a game that utilizes WizKids Games' proprietary Dice Building Game platform in which two players take the role of warlords, collect and assemble their _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;party_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of adventurer dice and battle in head-to-head gameplay. Each turn, players roll the dice to see what resources they have available, buy dice, send their party members into the field, and then strike at the enemy warlord. There are multiple cards available for each type of die so players get to choose which one to use. This lets players specialize dice to suit play style._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Additional cards and dice to expand your collection can be found in expansion packs. Each Foil Pack contains two cards and two dice that players can add to their Dice Masters Battle for Faer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ucirc;n collections. Players can create teams of their favorite fantasy characters from the Forgotten Realms universe. You can expect to see some of the most recognizable monsters and characters, such as Kobolds, Beholders, Mindflayers, Dragons, Drow, and many more!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons Dice Masters line will consist of starter sets, booster packs, play mats, and a storage box._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes:
***PRE-ORDER - Expected in stock Friday 20th March*** ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ginger Games - Great Games, Great Service www.gingergames.co.uk Postage
We will post to the UK and Ireland (see www.gingergames.co.uk for postage cost to Ireland) Standard rate for the UK is £3.98 and items will usually be dispatched within 24 hours Returns policy
Our returns policy can be found at www.gingergames.co.uk

I am selling a complete set (NOT including the starter set) of the Common, Uncommon, Rare, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Super Rare cards along with their dice. I am also including an additional Common set and its dice so that, in conjunction with the starter set, you will have 4 dice (max) for each card type. I am including shipping in the price :). The cards are all excellent, I personally culled through many gravity feeds and I only included cards in my sets for sale that were excellent (no bent corners, tears, marred areas, misprints, machine imprinting across the bottom edge, chipped edges, etc.). Please be reasonable with your expectations though as it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s possible something extremely minor and difficult to notice made it past my scrutiny. Remember, FREE SHIPPING!

Big lot of Common and Uncommon cards. Each card comes with its associated die unless otherwise specified. Beholder: Lesser Aberration Blue Dragon: Lesser Dragon x2 Carrion Crawler: Greater Aberration x2 Copper Dragon: Greater Dragon x3 (only 2 dice) Dracolich: Greater Undead Dragon x2 Drow Assassin: Greater Humanoid Dwarf Cleric: Greater Emerald Enclave x3 Frost Giant: Greater Elemental x2 Green Dragon: Lesser Dragon x2 Half-Dragon: Greater Humanoid x2 Halfling Thief: Lesser Lords Alliance Limited Wish: Greater Spell x4 Magic Helmet: Greater Gear x4 Magic Sword: Greater Gear Mummy: Greater Undead x2 Orc: Greater Humanoid x3 Owlbear: Greater Beast x2 Prismatic Spray: Lesser Spell Prismatic Spray: Greater Spell x2 Red Dragon: Greater Dragon Skeleton: Greater Undead Tarrasque: Greater Aberration Treant: Greater Beast x2 Troll: Lesser Humanoid x2 Umber Hulk: Greater Beast x2 Vampire: Lesser Undead x3 Wererat: Greater Lycanthrope Zombie: Greater Undead x2 Cards are in near-perfect condition (no tears, marks, creases) but may have a slight warp due to the original booster packaging. US shipping is a flat $4, international is a flat $10. I have other D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D singles for sale, shipping is a fixed price regardless of how many you purchase.
One unopened box of faerun, plus 10 unopened packets of boosters. $5 shipping. prefer local pickup. paypal gift option,

I have other D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D singles for sale, shipping is a fixed price regardless of how many you purchase.
